mapper.select: select * from tb_report_form_output_store WHERE type = #{type} and duty_start_time = #{dutyStartTime};
mapper.insert: insert into tb_report_form_output_store ( duty_start_time, clened_coal, washed_coal, slime, washery_rejects, raw_coal, raw_coal_8, raw_coal_13, type, local_washed_coal) VALUES (#{dutyStartTime},#{clenedCoal},#{washedCoal},#{slime},#{washeryRejects},#{rawCoal},#{rawCoal8},#{rawCoal13},#{type},#{localWashedCoal})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_report_form_output_store SET duty_start_time = #{dutyStartTime}, clened_coal = #{clenedCoal}, washed_coal = #{washedCoal}, slime = #{slime}, washery_rejects = #{washeryRejects}, raw_coal = #{rawCoal}, raw_coal_8 = #{rawCoal8}, raw_coal_13 = #{rawCoal13}, type = #{type}, local_washed_coal = #{localWashedCoal} WHERE id = #{id}
